thread.title: Two Triangle colleges are among top 20 for school spirit, but which ranks higher: red or blue?
thread.title_full: Two Triangle colleges are among top 20 for school spirit, but which ranks higher: red or blue?

author: Rebecca Troyer
title: Two Triangle colleges are among top 20 for school spirit, but which ranks higher: red or blue?
text:
Enlarge Tar_Heel_Rob N.C. State University ranks No. 15 and UNC-Chapel Hill ranks No. 20 on a recent ranking of the top 20 "Colleges with the most school spirit" based on responses to Princeton Review surveys, reported by Business Insider . The rankings are based on the survey question to students, "How popular are intercollegiate sports at your school?" At N.C. State, "tailgate culture is a student favorite," says BI . "Wolfpack pride is evident and students say basketball and football games are obligatory at N.C. State." And here's what BI says about school spirit at UNC: "Tar Heel fans are extremely passionate about their basketball team and its storied rivalry with neighboring Duke University . Games tend to draw huge crowds of students and Chapel Hill-area families alike." Duke did not make the list. The top college for school spirit? Clemson University, followed by Penn State at University Park, University of Kansas, University of Iowa and University of Connecticut. 
Want Raleigh/Durham Travel   Business Pulse
